replies.author: mssfang

replies.bodyText: These are code snippets that would be inserted in the method java docs. I think we should keep them shorter and to the point, that shows how to use the method. We don't need to handle all the fail through scenarios here, samples should be a good place to do that. What do you think?
replies.author: samvaity

replies.bodyText: Ya. Let's keep this codesnippet shorter.
replies.author: mssfang
